1062620.name: The Cursed Forest Original Soundtrack
1062620.description:
On The Cursed Forest music worked two composers Konstantin Shmyrev and Nikita Yamov + Ann Yakubenko vocal. Also, in DLC we included some art that was made by Vladyslav Liedienov.

Nikita Yamov:

  • Downward
  • End Credits
  • Farewell
  • Into the Darkness
  • On the Cliff
  • The Dawn
  • The Winding Path Ahead
  • Bonus Track 1
  • Bonus Track 2

Konstantin Shmyrev:

  • Curse
  • Curse and Wonder
  • Hide and seek with Sarah
  • House+Build+up
  • Main menu
  • Main theme
  • The Cursed Forest teaser
  • The Drive
  • Bonus Track 1
  • Bonus Track 2
